/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a hazy blue, suggesting either early morning or late afternoon. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
